title: Deadly Business - [A Primavera Blackstone Mystery, #4] - Quintin
description:
The thrilling fourth Primavera Blackstone crime mystery from Scotland's Crime Master

It's the Fiesta de San Juan in Spain, the national celebration of the Summer Solstice, and there's much excitement about a huge firework display in the village of St. Marti. But Primavera Blackstone is more inflamed by the appearance of a mysterious writer, Duncan Culshaw, who is determined to rake through the ashes of her past. And when extortion and blackmail are mentioned, Primavera realizes the heat is on. Duncan has his fingers burned playing fast and loose with the fiercely protective Prim, but when he marries a dying woman for her money and threatens the inheritance of Prim's son Tom, things are going to get explosive. But happily, there's a new guardian angel in town.
